clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of postoperative inflammation in patients who have undergone cataract extraction

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Bromfenac ophthalmic solution is a sterile topical nonsteroidal anti inflammatory drug NSAID for ophthalmic use

incompatibilities.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Aminosalicylic acid can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Mesalazine can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Sulfasalazine can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Diflunisal can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Acetylsalicylic acid can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Balsalazide can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac

The therapeutic efficacy of Bismuth subsalicylate can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Dersalazine can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Phenyl aminosalicylate can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Methyl salicylate can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Trolamine salicylate can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Nitroaspirin can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Aloxiprin can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Guacetisal can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Carbaspirin calcium can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Choline salicylate can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
The therapeutic efficacy of Thiosalicylic acid can be decreased when used in combination with Bromfenac
